dcterms:description: This dataset consists of two 30 µm3 volumes, 1000 × 4096 × 4096 in voxels at 30 × 8 × 8 nm3 resolution. The image volumes are acquired from a rat (MitoEM-R) and a human (MitoEM-H) tissue, respectively. For each image stack, only the labels of the first 500 slices have been published, and the labels of the remaining 500 slices are unreleased.
dcterms:title: MitoEM dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Knott
H. Marchman
D. Wall
B. Lich
dcterms:description: This dataset is obtained from mouse hippocampus and composed by a training volume and a testing volume. Each volume with a resolution of 5 × 5 × 5 nm3/voxel consists of 165 slices and the size of each slice is 1024 × 768.
dcterms:title: FIB-SEM dataset
